reviews.text: I took a little trip to Easton with my friends and we have always heard wonderful things about Brassica. We decided to give it a chance and try it...
Great quick food option. All of the veggie toppings are out of this world. Love love the eggplant
This place is like a Mediterranean Chipotle. Now with that terrible comparison out of the way, I will say: this was easily the best restaurant I happened...
